website_summaries.verdict: The redesigned Razer Blade moves the bar on slim gaming laptops, with better hardware and a bigger screen, but you'll need a bigger budget for it, too.
pros: Great overall redesign, with a larger screen, smaller bezels and bigger touchpad
Includes either an Nvidia 1060 or 1070 GPU, which is enough for almost any laptop gamer
Cool keyboard lights, if that's your bag
cons: Painfully expensive considering Nvidia 1060 laptops can be found for under $1,000
The 4K touchscreen option isn't available yet

customer_reviews.title: Macbook for Gaming
customer_reviews.text: Like a friend of mine said, "it looks like a macbook but for gaming." I don't know why other people are having issues with the computer, I love the design and it runs games like a beast. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amit

customer_reviews.title: Good but hot
customer_reviews.text: First week with this product on a daily 5h gaming routine. All my games are running very good, making a great gaming experience, comparable to a PC’s. The only negative part is that it gets so hot, making you enable the cooler, which is very loud, but the laptop is still very hot. I advise you to buy this only if you like slim laptops.
customer_reviews.author: Radu

customer_reviews.title: Awful customer suooprt by razer
customer_reviews.text: it is surely the worst customer support I've ever seen. The charging brick went wrong and I asked for an exchange. The process is unbelievably slow that I have not get my charging brick for over ONE MONTH and they are replying your email in maybe 3 days, too fxxking slow. Dell or asus would be far better than this.

customer_reviews.title: Best value for money computer I've seen.
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a Razer before, but this was quite a happy surprise. The specs of this computer are insane, especially when you consider the price. I don't game much, but for testing purposes I ran a few on max settings and had zero issues. People have stated that putting the computer in gaming mode DOES cause issues, so I just didn't put it in gaming mode. The qaulity is superb. I use this mostly for school and work and have not been let down. The charging cable is a bit large, but it also is not flimst like a lot of cables. Very happy with this
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Coolest gaming laptop

customer_reviews.title: Best Value 15 Inch Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of searching and comparison of other gaming laptops and ultimately settled here because of value for the dollar. It's a 15 inch laptop but doesn't feel or look like a typical 15 inch laptop. The GPU is getting dated by newer technology but this laptop allows for the connection of an external GPU via Thunderbolt which was a huge bonus to me. Most games I play are set at High or High-Ultra for this laptop. With the external GPU option, I'll be set for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P.

customer_reviews.title: came broken and seller wont take it back
customer_reviews.text: first day getting this product it ramped up to 100 deg Celsius and became unusable, seller didn't return a single response from me and neither did amazon so I sent it to Razer, motherboard needed replacing and cost me $1000 just for repairs, if you're getting a laptop don't get this one and if you do, get a warranty, battery lasts maybe 2 hours. Terrible product, terrible seller, Amazon really needs to hold their sellers more responsible, the box it came in didn't even have foam the laptop was basically taped down.

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: It performs fine but the battery life when playing a game is an hour at best and it's ridiculously overpriced. Only reason I got this is because Amazon let me make payments on it.

customer_reviews.title: Very poor customer support
customer_reviews.text: Had product for 1.5 year before it simply refused to turn on. Causing major issues as I am in school. Previously had MacBook that lasted 8 years that cost roughly the same as this laptop. Very disappointed in resources to support troubleshooting or figuring out repairs. Recommend using a potato over this brand in the future. Unless something changes I will never deal with Razer in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Razer 15 review
customer_reviews.text: Since Razer started making laptops, I have always wanted to purchase one. The price range, at the time, was a bit high and for the specs, I respected it. Now I was able to purchase the 15in with 144hz and a 512GB SSD. Everything I have thrown at it was handled 100%. Warcraft plays at a crisp 100 FPS. All my other games are handled just as good and I even noticed the microphone is pretty cool to with the directional features. Once again, another great product from Razer. Nothing less than what I expected from you guys. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: jorge hasbun

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect so far.
customer_reviews.text: Laptop is almost perfect. I wish both the regular and hold down shift options on the key board lit up. I wish the keys would turn off after less than 1 minute of no use (1 minute is the lowest in the razer software current verison). I also with Razer would have stepped up and took the lead and built an HDR display but tbh the blade 15 144hz display is quite gorgeous. The colors are so accurate. System stays cool unless you block the bottom back side where the fans and heat sink are. The gtx 1060 is more than good enough for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Best Laptop I Ever Got
customer_reviews.text: I love my Razer Blade 15 Gaming Laptop. I use it all the time and I use it every day. I use it for work, school, and gaming. I game a lot and it can anything. I have played many games on max settings and I can get max frame rates. I also connect two monitors when I am at home with the Mini Display port and the HDMI port. The speakers are great too. This laptop is known for speed as well which I like. The graphics are amazing and the laptop does a great job. I use it constantly and for the money, I have to say its the best laptop I ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing performance for the size
customer_reviews.text: I've had this machine for around half a year now and haven't run into any major issues. The worst I could say about the device is how quickly it can heat up, however that is to be expected from slim gaming/higher performance laptops. Otherwise the computer has offered more than enough performance for high quality 1080p gaming. The build quality on the device is among the best I've personally seen in gaming notebooks. All while actually managing to be a very portable gaming machine.
customer_reviews.author: David Reichart

customer_reviews.title: Best looking laptop I've ever seen!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is almost 3 times as good as my desktop from only a couple years ago, The 144hz Full HD screen looks great and is very smooth. The style is very sleek and similar to weight and shape as the MacBook pro. I would recommend this computer to anyone looking for a gaming laptop, plus support is very helpful and quick!
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Body Warping
customer_reviews.text: The laptops components work great. However, the body of the laptop has begun to warp after a year of gaming. The laptop now wobbles while on a flat surface.
